summary: Torn between all the different and awesome textures for the Dynasty Armour available? Fret no more! With this mod, you can have all of them at once! That\'s right, ALL of them! 75 different variants available!! Chainmails and crowns included.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Ultimate Dynasty Collection
Version: 3.3
Date: 30/03/2012
Category: Weapons and Armor
Author(s): Midnight Falcon
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7270

Please do endorse this mod if you enjoy it. Helps to encourage me =)

IMPORTANT NOTE
==================
Should you come across any armour glitches or bugs while using this mod, kindly post in the forums describing the problem, listing the exact armour piece which is problematic and, if possible, upload a screenshot to the image section of this file so that it\'s easier for me to identify the problem and fix it. 

Thank you.

Also, requesting for someone to convert the dynasty armour for the UNP body. I tried, and the armour exploded. I hate moving vertices >_>
Location
========
Innkeeper of The Bannered Mare in Whiterun

Details
=======
Everything about the armours is the same as the originals, with the exception of all them being standalone and having different textures. Craftable, Upgradeable and sold by the innkeeper in The Bannered Mare
Current Textures used
=====================
Silver Black texture by TardOnPC- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13427
Sapphire series textures by rpg1203- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7013
Gold, Silver and Gray Chainmail Textures by gamergirl109- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5977
Default Chainmail Textures by codecrackerx9
Crimson and Dark Crimson textures by haldir307- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6261
CBBE Default textures by drakishar- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6166
Dynasty Gold Armour by codecrackerx9 and ken1945- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5733
Ruby, Sapphire, Amethyst and Emerald by Dalmatan- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6308
Ebony and Gold Dynasty Armor by gamergirl109- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6218
Dynasty White Armour by Simomax- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6164

To Come
======== 
-ADEC
-Vanilla
-Shields (?)

Updates
=======
Also, should any of you find a texture that I have not included in this mod, please direct me to it and I\'ll request permission from the mod author to include it in this mod.

If anyone should find someone that has created a dynasty armor mesh for the UNP body, please direct me to that mod author and I\'ll request permission to add it to this mod.

Installation
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\Armor\\Dynasty\\

Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Armor\\Dynasty\\

Skyrim\\Data\\Dynasty Armour Collection.esp


History
=======
3.3, 2012/28/03 - Fixed the esp to correct some errors.
3.2, 2012/28/03 - Updated the CHSBHC version fully. Added silver black armours, as well as gold, grey and silver chainmails.
3.2, 2012/26/03 - Added new Silver Black textures for both CBBE variants
3.1, 2012/18/03 - Uploaded non-chainmail and blue chainmail for CHSBHC
3.1, 2012/18/03 - Fixed textures for CBBE and all crowns
3.0, 2012/18/03 - Brought BBP up to date, and fixed previous texture errors.
3.0, 2012/18/03 - Added armour images in inventory. It\'s far from perfect, but it\'s the ebst I can do. Fixed chainmail reflections near fires.
2.5, 2012/03/03 - Fixed all helmet bugs. Added new sapphire series.
2.4, 2012/03/02 - Added Helmets
2.3, 2012/03/01 - Fixed all curent errors
2.2, 2012/02/01 - Added silver and gold chainmail variants
2.1, 2012/02/01 - Fixed all current errors for version 2.1
2.1, 2012/02/01 - Added grey chainmail version, changed vendor to the innkeeper of The Bannered Mare in Whiterun
2.0, 2012/01/31 - Added blue chainmail versions for all current available meshes.
1.1, 2012/01/29 - Repackaged for easier installation
1.0, 2012/01/29 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
You can find me on Nexus as cchoay


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to ken1945 for creating this armour in the first place.
Thanks to codecrackerx9 for patiently teaching me how to mod as well as the port for this mod.
Thanks to drakishar for the CBBE mesh of the Dynasty Armour.
Thanks to jgreybear for helping me figure out how to make the chainmails work properly
Thanks to Gromit84 for helping me figure out how to change vendors properly.
Thanks to Quickfox for the use of his helmet meshes
Thanks to all the various other modders who created the textures I have used. Their names are listed above^

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
author: Midnight Falcon
